name: Procedural Audio Prototype
description:
This is prototype of a integration between LÖVE and Pure Data (with libpd).

There are no collisions, correct character rendering or any gameplay whatsoever. All sounds are procedurally generated.

Controls:

  • arrow keys - walk (footsteps sound)
  • F1 - toggle rain
  • F2 - toggle wind
  • F3 - toggle cicada
  • F4 - trigger thunder
